column2: Considering above,  I  am  of the  view that there  had  been  no  miscarriage of justice
in  the  instant case,  which warrants  the  invocation of the revisionary  powers of this

column3: the  order  of  the  Learned  High  Court  Judge  dated

column2: 11.01.2019 and the order of the Learned Magistrate dated 25.10.2018.
Accordingly this application is  hereby dismissed.

column3: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
